Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<IServerPacket>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game
extends Observable<IServerPacket>
Model class representing the game state, contains references to all other game model objects. Notifies all registered observer of state updates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Game()
    Constructs a new game with the default game configurations.
    Game​(GameConfig gameConfig)
    Constructs a new game with the given game configurations.

  • Method Details

    • getBaseProductionPower

      public BaseProductionPower getBaseProductionPower()
      Gets the base production power for this Game.
      Returns:
      the base production power

    • getLorenzo

      public Lorenzo getLorenzo()
      Gets the singleplayer opponent.
      Returns:
      the lorenzo that is the current singleplayer opponent, if the game is not singleplayer return null

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(Player player)
      Adds the given Player to the game.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that will be added to the game

    • getPlayerByName

      public Player getPlayerByName​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Gets the Player with the given name.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player to search for
      Returns:
      the player with the given name or null if not found

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the current Player.
      Returns:
      the current player

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer​(Player currentPlayer) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the current Player.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player that will be set as current player
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given player is not in the player list of this game

      Gets all players.
      Returns:
      a list of players participating in this game

    • getPlayerAt

      public Player getPlayerAt​(int index)
      Gets the player at the given index in the players list.
      Parameters:
      index - the position of the player in the player list
      Returns:
      the player in the given position

      public int getPlayerCount()
      Gets the number of players.
      Returns:

      Sets the current game phase.

    • startLastRound

      public void startLastRound​(Player player)
      Sets the game to the last round game phase.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that caused this phase to start

    • isLastRound

      public boolean isLastRound()
      Checks if it is the last round of the game.
      Returns:
      true if it is the last round, false otherwise

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      Passes the turn to the next player, if the current player is the last in the players list restarts from the first player.

    • isLastPlayerTurn

      public boolean isLastPlayerTurn()
      Checks if it is the last player turn.
      Returns:
      true if it is the last player turn

    • createLorenzo

      public Lorenzo createLorenzo()
      Creates the singleplayer opponent.

    • randomSortPlayers

      public void randomSortPlayers()
      Randomizes players list order.

    • terminate

      public void terminate​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> scores, java.lang.String winnerName)
      Terminates a game, sending scores and the winner name to Players.
      Parameters:
      scores - the final scores of this game
      winnerName - the winner name

    • terminateSingleplayer

      public void terminateSingleplayer​(boolean lorenzoWin, java.lang.String loseReason, int playerScore)
      Terminates a single player game, sending results to the Player.
      Parameters:
      lorenzoWin - boolean representing if Lorenzo has won
      loseReason - the reason why Lorenzo has won, if lorenzoWin is false, this will be ignored
      playerScore - the score of the Player, if lorenzoWin is true, this will be ignored

    • calculateFaithTrackVictoryPoints

      public int calculateFaithTrackVictoryPoints​(int faithPoints)
      Calculates victory points awarded by the given position in the faith track.
      Parameters:
      faithPoints - the progression in the faith track
      Returns:
      the victory points awarded by the given position in the faith track

    • checkForPopeReportSlot

      public int checkForPopeReportSlot​(int faithPoints)
      Checks if there is a pope report slot before the given position in the faith track.
      Parameters:
      faithPoints - the position in the faith track to check from
      Returns:
      the index of the pope report slot if found, -1 otherwise

    • activatePopeReport

      public void activatePopeReport​(int popeReportSlot)
      Activates the pope report action that awards.
      Parameters:
      popeReportSlot - the pope report slot that caused the activation

    • notifyChatMessage

      public void notifyChatMessage​(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String message)
      Notifies the clients of a new global chat message.
      Parameters:
      sender - the player that has sent the message
      message - the content of the message

    • notifyInvalidAction

      public void notifyInvalidAction​(Player player, java.lang.String message)
      Notifies the Player that one of the action that he has tried to perform is invalid.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that should be notified
      message - the error message
